arts.ttl: Paddy's Pointers: Four observations after Norwich's Clarets defeat
arts.sum: Pink Un editor Paddy Davitt delivers his Burnley verdict after the Canaries 2-1 Championship defeat.

arts.ttl: Burnley come from behind to beat Norwich
arts.sum: Burnley recovered from the shock of conceding a goal after just 64 seconds to reclaim third place in the Championship by beating Norwich with a 2-1 comeback victory at Carrow Road.

arts.ttl: Burnley edge comeback win at Norwich and reclaim third place in Championship
arts.sum: Norwich defender Jose Cordoba headed home his first goal in English football to give his side a dream start before Burnley hit back.

arts.ttl: 'Feast your eyes on that!!' | Burnley score 30-yard wonder strike!
arts.sum: Watch this 30-yard stunner from Burnley's Zian Flemming against Norwich!

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Norwich City v Burnley
arts.sum: Follow live match updates and join the debate as Norwich City face Burnley in the Championship this afternoon.

arts.ttl: Birmingham City target ambitious deal for Burnley fringe man
arts.sum: Birmingham City are interested in a possible winter move for Burnley winger Nathan Redmond, according to The Sun.… The post Birmingham City target ambitious deal for Burnley fringe man appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: Norwich vs Burnley predictions: Clarets have too much class for Canaries
arts.sum: Burnley can extend their unbeaten run to eight games and maintain their Championship promotion push with victory over Norwich on Sunday Aidan Perkins believes.

arts.ttl: Hills and Myles feature in Norwich U21s' Boro defeat
arts.sum: Norwich City under-21s' burgeoning momentum came to a grinding halt as they were beaten 3-1 by Middlesbrough at Colney.

arts.ttl: MATCHDAY LIVE: Norwich City U21s v Middlesbrough
arts.sum: Follow live updates from Norwich City under-21s’ Premier League 2 meeting with Middlesbrough at the Avant Training Centre.

arts.ttl: Preview: Norwich City vs. Burnley - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Sunday's Championship clash between Norwich City and Burnley, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
